goal.en: Introducing pricipals and its applications of low frequency EM wave.
goal.ch: 電磁波測勘原理與應用

content.en:
1. EM theory review
2. Resistivity of rocks
3. DC resistivity
4. 1D modeling and inversion
5. Induced polarization
6. Magnetotellurics
7. Time domain EM
8. Frequency domain EM
9. Comparisons among the methods
content.ch:
1.電磁學複習
2.岩石的電性
3.一維模擬及逆推
4.直流電阻法
5.感應極化法
6.大地電磁法
7.控源大地電磁法
8.暫態電磁法
9.透地雷達
10.各電磁波方法之比較

textbook.en:
"1.Ward, S. H., Geotechnical and environmental geophysics, SEG.
2.Ward, S. H., et al., Mining Geophysics, SEG.
3.Keller, G. V., and F. C. Frischknecht, 1996, Electrical methods in geophysical prospecting, New York, Pergamon Press, Inc.
4.Telford, W. M., et al., Apply geophysics"
textbook.ch:
"1.Ward, S. H., Geotechnical and environmental geophysics, SEG.
2.Ward, S. H., et al., Mining Geophysics, SEG.
3.Keller, G. V., and F. C. Frischknecht, 1996, Electrical methods in geophysical prospecting, New York, Pergamon Press, Inc.
4.Telford, W. M., et al., Apply geophysics"

method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗

grading.en: "participation and homework:40%, term project and report:60%"

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance
